name: ipcams
description: A monitor and web portal for interesting IP cameras
author: Gio Palacino <gio@palacino.net>

scripts.reset: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf src/app/node_modules && yarn install && cd ./src/app && yarn install
scripts.build: rm -rf ./build && webpack && yarn --cwd ./src/app build && yarn move:app
scripts.serve: set -o allexport; source ./.env; set +o allexport; ts-node ./src/server/serve.ts
scripts.express: cd ./build/server && npm init -y && npm install --production --no-optional --no-save --prefix . express
scripts.start: yarn build && sudo docker compose up --build --detach
scripts.dockerize: yarn build && yarn docker:build && echo "Please push images from a local and authenticated device."
scripts.docker:build: sudo docker build --platform=linux/amd64 --load --rm -f Dockerfile -t giocirque/reecam-web:latest -t giocirque/reecam-web:$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) .
